name: Thinking About Trucks
description:
Monster trucks. Pickup trucks. Jeeps. Vintage trucks. Dump trucks. SUVs. Mack trucks. Cement trucks. Tow trucks.

Yes, this game is about trucks!

Thinking About Trucks is for kids who think about trucks, and for parents desperately in need of a few moments of silence.

Need some quiet on your road trip? Need someone to sit still on that flight to Dallas? Want a few minutes to enjoy adult conversation at the restaurant?

Then keep reading.

Let your child's imagination run wild by picking a truck chassis, coloring it, adding some tires and rocking a decal. Then your child can choose a grand finale and watch his/her creation pull off some amazing stunts.

9 truck bodies x 9 colors x 9 tires x 9 decals x 4 finales equals some really big number of total permutations that will keep your child busy for hours (maybe there is a good calculator app to compute that number).
